name: Drudge Pitcher
description: The Drudge Pitcher is a Huge plant creature with the ability to trap enemies inside its pitchers while regenerating from their remains, and transforming them into zombie minions.
memorable: It can create undead minions and regenerate by consuming foes, turning them into zombies that serve it.
goals: To ensnare foes and dominate the battlefield by creating undead minions.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead or plant creatures.
environment: Often found in swampy or overgrown areas where it can go unnoticed.
strengths: High hit points, natural armor, ability to control undead.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Can make multiple Vine Slam attacks and potentially trap enemies with its Pitcher Swallow ability, dealing bludgeoning and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Undead Creator allows it to regenerate health and create zombies from slain foes.
senses: Has blindsight out to 60 feet, allowing it to perceive nearby creatures despite blindness beyond that range.
skills: Average perception skills, providing basic awareness.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic damage and certain conditions like being blinded or exhausted.
Resistant to bludgeoning and piercing damage.
Can trap enemies within its pitchers, blinding and restraining them.
Maintains control over zombies created from defeated foes.
Can endure through long battles due to high Constitution.
test_queries: huge plant creature that creates zombies
monster that traps enemies in pitcher
manipulative creature with undead creation ability
tough plant monster with high hit points
creature that regenerates from killed foes
